adv: It is pretty simple to understand. The related views makes it really easy to automatically just pick the right graphs. The dashboard is pretty easy to use and doesn't require a lot of technical knowledge. The bookmark option was pretty handy to come back to the saved graphs and check.
disadv: The graph types are very fixed and are not flexible at all. The number values are way too small and are really hard to read. Most of the visualizations are not very pretty and the color schemes are not appealing. There is no data set description so it was hard to understand what the data was representing.
comment: I think the most important part is to use lots of different types of charts like bubble charts, geographic charts, clustered bars instead of using plain stacked bars and scatter plots.
